data.text: @NBCPhiladelphia @amberheard NBC10 has turned into a click bait joke.  Way to go and ruin someone's twitter page on top of it.

@NBCPhiladelphia @amberheard Straight up respect, people that actually care should make sure all their inmigrant workers that care for their homes, childs, and is in contact with any real american should do exactly what you said. Praise you, for someone bringing that up. Hate twitter but saw on IG.
